医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
枫糖浆是终极天然甜味剂吗？研究人员表示，它不仅仅是美味！科学家们探索了枫糖浆的无数好处，揭示了它相对于传统甜味剂的营养、药理和感官优势。从抗氧化和抗炎特性到控制血糖，甚至潜在的抗癌作用，枫糖浆不仅仅是一种美味的配料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Is-maple-syrup-the-ultimate-natural-sweetener-Researchers-say-its-more-than-just-tasty!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Is-maple-syrup-the-ultimate-natural-sweetener-Researchers-say-its-more-than-just-tasty!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d78915c1-ebd4-400f-b23c-cbd7449c2583 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 22:42:00 -0400 Is maple syrup the ultimate natural sweetener? Researchers say it's more than just tasty!
释放凝集素的力量：BOA 成为对抗所有 SARS-CoV-2 变种的有力武器研究人员发现，像 BOA 这样的抗病毒凝集素可以通过靶向刺突聚糖来有效抑制 SARS-CoV-2 及其变体，为潜在的泛冠状病毒治疗打开了大门。该研究表明，BOA 的多价相互作用使其成为一系列病毒变体的有效抑制剂，为未来的治疗策略带来了希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Unlocking-the-power-of-lectins-BOA-emerges-as-a-potted-weapon-against-all-SARS-CoV-2-variants。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Unlocking-the-power-of-lectins-BOA-emerges-as-a-potted-weapon-against-all-SARS-CoV-2-variants。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81663d8d-5632-416f-a961-458d60e4bf3c Thu, 14 Sep 2023 21:36:00 -0400 Unlocking the power of lectins: BOA emerges as a potent weapon against all SARS-CoV-2 variants
过去的感染可能会影响你的新冠疫苗加强剂对抗 Omicron 的效果这项深入研究探讨了先前的免疫力如何影响 COVID-19 加强疫苗接种的有效性以及对 Omicron 突破性感染的易感性。该研究强调了个体免疫史在塑造针对 SARS-CoV-2 的体液和细胞反应中的重要作用，敦促制定更有针对性的疫苗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Past-infections-may-shape-your-COVID-boosters-punch-against-Omicron.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Past-infections-may-shape-your-COVID-boosters-punch-against-Omicron.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6edb3d0e-9ac3-4f92-acce-1c5004c9dca8 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 21:26:00 -0400 Past infections may shape your COVID booster's punch against Omicron
APOE4 基因如何在您的健康风险中扮演英雄和恶棍的角色？该研究表明，APOE4 是阿尔茨海默病和心血管疾病的遗传风险因素，对死亡风险具有复杂的影响。虽然 AD 神经病理学较高的 APOE4 携带者死亡风险增加，但神经病理学较低的 APOE4 携带者患某些癌症的风险较低，因此有必要进一步研究这种遗传因素对健康结果的不同影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/How-does-the-APOE4-gene-play-both-hero-and-villain-in-your-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/How-does-the-APOE4-gene-play-both-hero-and-villain-in-your-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5ec8df4-c8bb-4404-a1b3-1f8149a60c37 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 21:19:00 -0400 How does the APOE4 gene play both hero and villain in your health risks?
既往 SARS-CoV-2 感染和 mRNA 疫苗接种对传染性和感染风险的影响研究发现，与 mRNA 疫苗相比，自然 SARS-CoV-2 感染可提供更强的针对病毒的免疫力。然而，mRNA 疫苗可显着降低 COVID-19 个体的传染性，在限制病毒传播方面发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Impact-of-prior-SARS-CoV-2-infection-and-mRNA-vaccination-on-contagiousness-and-infection-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Impact-of-prior-SARS-CoV-2-infection-and-mRNA-vaccination-on-contagiousness-and-infection-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0909445-e1e3-4ed5-9512-bf6972dc1c1d Thu, 14 Sep 2023 21:08:00 -0400 Impact of prior SARS-CoV-2 infection and mRNA vaccination on contagiousness and infection risk
20 多岁的体力活动似乎对女性晚年的心脏健康有益昆士兰大学的研究人员发现，女性可以在 20 多岁时保留锻炼的好处，并在以后的生活中保持更好的心脏健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Physical-activity-in-the-20s-appears-to-provide-heart-health-benefits-for-women-in-later-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Physical-activity-in-the-20s-appears-to-provide-heart-health-benefits-for-women-in-later-life.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f14a8956-ebc9-47ae-97bf-00ee25a25e52 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 18:17:00 -0400 Physical activity in the 20s appears to provide heart health benefits for women in later life
研究表明，声音学习、解决问题和大脑大小可能是一起进化的欧洲八哥拥有非凡的技能。椋鸟是多才多艺的鸣禽，一生都在学习啭鸣、口哨、叫声和歌曲，是最先进的鸟类声音学习者之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Vocal-learning-problem-solving-and-brain-size-may-have-evolved-together-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Vocal-learning-problem-solving-and-brain-size-may-have-evolved-together-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c4eb671-fce8-4e65-bd1a-fa9bcf0a4fad Thu, 14 Sep 2023 17:52:00 -0400 Vocal learning, problem solving, and brain size may have evolved together, study suggests
HNP-1可能是治疗高血压左心室肥厚的有前途的药物宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。人中性粒细胞肽-1 (HNP-1) 是一种经常研究的治疗剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/HNP-1-may-be-a-promising-therapeutic-agent-for-hypertential-left-心室-hypertropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/HNP-1-may-be-a-promising-therapeutic-agent-for-hypertential-left-心室-hypertropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c5144c2-8cd6-4e85-b909-3564c701341b Thu, 14 Sep 2023 17:44:00 -0400 HNP-1 may be a promising therapeutic agent for hypertensive left ventricular hypertrophy
CDC 拨款 870 万美元用于培训和教育媒介传播疾病专业人员为了帮助应对新出现的和既定的病媒传播威胁，由康奈尔大学领导的东北地区病媒传播疾病卓越中心 (NEVBD) 获得了疾病控制和预防中心颁发的为期五年、价值 870 万美元的奖项（ CDC）培训和教育当前和未来的媒介传播疾病专业人员，并评估社区和区域预防策略的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/CDC-awards-2487-million-to-train-and-educate-vector-borne-disease-professionals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/CDC-awards-2487-million-to-train-and-educate-vector-borne-disease-professionals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23acb96d-0da0-4e31-aaf0-2efcc91eb96d Thu, 14 Sep 2023 17:36:00 -0400 CDC awards $8.7 million to train and educate vector-borne disease professionals
RIT 研究人员因了解皮质失明的影响而获奖罗彻斯特理工学院切斯特·卡尔森影像科学中心副教授加布里埃尔·迪亚兹 (Gabriel Diaz) 与罗彻斯特大学的研究人员合作，荣获防盲研究/狮子会国际基金会低视力研究奖 (LVRA)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/RIT-researcher-receives-award-to-understand-the-effects-of-cortical-blindness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/RIT-researcher-receives-award-to-understand-the-effects-of-cortical-blindness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=289502fe-dc1d-467c-8241-81976df8abc7 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 17:26:00 -0400 RIT researcher receives award to understand the effects of cortical blindness
